directions: Remove the stems and seeds from the chile peppers.  Soak in cold water for 20 minutes, then drain.  Place the peppers, garlic, caraway, coriander, and salt in a mortar; pound with a pestle until smooth.  Place harissa in a jar, and cover the top with a little oil to maintain freshness.  Store in the refrigerator.
title: Tunisian Harissa
